wallet.pageDescription: Add your emergency card to Apple Wallet or Google Wallet

whyUse.title: Why use the digital card?
whyUse.reason1: Quick access from the lock screen
whyUse.reason3: No need to unlock the device
whyUse.reason4: Works with NFC on modern iPhones

notAvailable.title: Not available yet
notAvailable.description: Wallet passes are not yet configured on this server. In the meantime, you can use the QR code or NFC tags.

howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.step1: Add the card to your wallet by tapping the button
howItWorks.step2: The card will appear in your Wallet app
howItWorks.step3: In an emergency, medical staff can scan the QR code on the card
howItWorks.step4: On iPhones, they can also use NFC (without unlocking)
